website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price, good looks, and reliable performance – if you are looking for a top-of-the-line Bella microwave, this is an excellent pick.
pros: At 1,000 watts, this Bella microwave offers powerful, even cooking compared to options with lower wattage
Attractive stainless steel finish looks great in most kitchens and fits modern decor
cons: Priciest option on our shortlist, but it's still an economical choice compared to many other competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Grinding moaning gnashing noise!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible grinding moaning gnashing noise after about a week! I contacted Amazon about it and can return it without the original box, and I'm going to return it as soon as I get a box. Really, really awful noise from this thing. Also the open button is hard to use. Definitely avoid! Thanks Amazon for easy return policy
customer_reviews.author: rebecca r

customer_reviews.title: Shipped so fast it was insane, nice product, works well, happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice microwave, looks good, works well (so far), great size. I could not believe how fast this was shipped and how well it was packaged! I would definitely buy from this seller again! Thanks for the excellent service~
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Not just noisy, Extremely noisy.  It rattles.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is extremely noisy even when I tried putting a pad under it. Lucky for me Amazon Customer Service is great. I am sending it back. We are not so sure it is really functioning as advertised either. It is a shame as I was hunting a new company for kitchen electronics. I just get tired of the old guys, companies. They build great stuff a while then build in obsolescence so here we go again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Lousy product , bought it half a year ago, it oversteams and shuts off after half a year very dissatisfied, needed this size for built in also has a CA cancer warning just found out
customer_reviews.author: schoenen

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This micro does what it was hired to do. IT DOESN'T TAKE UP AN INORDINATE AMOUNT OF COUNT\ER SPACE, HEATS UP/COOKS FOOD AND WARMS BEVERAGES. iT IS NOT DIFFICULT TO USE, BUT I CAN'T REMEBER THE LAST TIME I HAD A MICRO WITHOUT A SPECIFIC POPCORN SETTING, although I have made po[pcrn in it. It looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Owned for just over a year.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this microwave for just over a year and the open button for it is going bad already. Also it is on the loud side. Save yourself the trouble and buy a better unit for extra instead of having to buy twice.
customer_reviews.author: Heimdal

customer_reviews.title: but does the job just fine. Not a good choice for lovers of quite ...
customer_reviews.text: It is noisier than more expensive microwaves, but does the job just fine. Not a good choice for lovers of quite appliances though.
customer_reviews.author: lani2shoes

customer_reviews.title: Works, but loud.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but is very loud. Food heats up quickly with 1000W of power, but the microwave lets out a shudder and vibrates when starting. The typical humming sound is very loud while running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overheated and blew fuse after 10 min. of use. Concerned about safety of product. Will need to return
customer_reviews.author: JPMN

customer_reviews.title: Niiiice
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave for the price. Yea it is kinda loud but who cares. Microwaves are inly supposed to run for a few minutes anyway
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Milner

customer_reviews.title: Makes major noise!!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave works, but has a terrible growling sound, most likely due to an inferior magnetron. Do not buy. Magnetron costs more to replace than microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Doing its job well!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good size, warms food evenly, we are happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: yaffa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave this for a gift. Was great. They loved it. Works very well it is heavy. Does not take up space easy to clean. Does the job. Heats well for all kinds of foods has degrees to change and it rings when ready
customer_reviews.author: Br456

customer_reviews.title: High quality easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this microwave every day. It’s big and powerful. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Olga Vasylieva

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was timely and good. Product is a piece of tin junk
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was timely and good. Product is a piece of tin junk. Very loud operation-sounds like something out a sci-fy horror movie
customer_reviews.author: woodin

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied at all
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived damaged in shipping. The replacement started acting up in 4 months. Turntable became lose and started making weird and scary noise during operation. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: D Shah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice in my new kitchen and works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Char M--Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stop beeping
customer_reviews.text: Microwave won’t stop beeping after food cooks. Called customer service and there is nothing they can do since we have had it for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P Sandwick

customer_reviews.title: I like this better than the smaller GE one I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a door that didn't have a tight seal, could see inside oven from hinge when closed and didn't want radiation leakage so exchanged for a new one. I like this better than the smaller GE one I had - I don't think that one lasted 1-1/2 years, that was my second oven. I like all the features, the size of it the Bella. It looks nice as well. Hope it lasts a long time. My first microwave oven lasted 20 years (GE).
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months. I'm looking to contact the ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months. I'm looking to contact the manufacturer because that is no where long enough for it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Welch

customer_reviews.title: a little flimsy, and doesn't warm fast. but ...
customer_reviews.text: a little flimsy, and doesn't warm fast. but it was inexpensive and does work and serves my limited purpose. if you are seriously cooking, you need to spend more than 100, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer K Law

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: button release to open door is entirely too difficult to push. other than that, works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 5 months and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: The buttons require some force to operate, and the writing on the buttons is kind of small. The mechanism to open the door feels cheap, but the microwave does work, and at least has not fogged up its door like our last one did in the first week. It's a $100 family-sized microwave, and therefore not much was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected but the only thing is it's just a little small inside. Another 1/4" would have made a big difference. Other than that I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Bella ordered Farberware received
customer_reviews.text: No offense meant regarding Bella! But I did not receive a Bella microwave rather a Farbereare ! I will leep the Farberware as it seems like an acceptable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little to loud
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job but it is a little to loud. Works well. Nice large cooking area for overall size of microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats food quickly and evenly
customer_reviews.text: The Bella microwave oven does what it is meant to; it heats food quickly and evenly. It also looks good. There are some annoying aspects, though. It slides on the counter when pushing the button to open the door. The unit is noisy. Some of the buttons are hard to read and need to be pushed just right for them to engage. The oven light is dim, making it difficult to see into the oven while food is cooking. If you can deal with these annoyances, you will likely be pleased with how well the oven heats food.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell R. Alegre

customer_reviews.title: Small &Affordable Basic Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Even though this microwave is touted as "family-sized", I'm not sure I would put it in that category at 1.1 cu ft. The microwave comes pre-loaded with the basic features now common with microwaves such as a popcorn and 30 second add buttons. In addition, you have the ability to adjust the cooking power with up to 10 levels. Defrosting settings are also available that allow both weight and time defrost. Overall, this is a great microwave for anyone who is looking for something small and affordable with all the basic functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's a microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This is a microwave. It cooks your food, and cooks it well. It's a very useful product and, let's face it, you know what it is and does. The front of this is nicely metal, and looks really good, with clearly laid-out buttons and an easy-to-read display. The rest of it is not covered in shiny metal, but still looks basically ok. So if you want a nice, heavy-duty nuker that looks pretty great from the front, then here you go!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Big!  Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is large enough to take big dinner plates: it takes over 12" sizes. With the power (1,000 watts) to cook really fast, this unit is great for dinners or snacks. It has more settings than I will ever use!
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

product_meta.title: Bella 1000-Watt Family Sized Digital Microwave Oven, 1.1 cu. ft, Stainless Steel/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless Steel/BlackBring a touch of fun and style to your kitchen with the family-sized countertop microwave from Bella. The Bella 1.1 Cubic Foot microwave oven offers 1000 Watts of power and 10 power levels for versatile food prep. The family-sized model features a removable 12.4-inch turntable to ensure even heating for oversized dinner plates and cookware. The Bella microwave includes an easy to use digital interface with an LED clock and kitchen timer. One-Touch cooking is at your fingertips with 1-6 minute Express Cook controls, convenient +30-Seconds control and 6 Quick Start One-Touch cooking functions for popcorn, beverage, dinner plate and more. The Bella microwave allows you to defrost by time or weight and offers Multi-Stage cooking that adjusts power level during the cooking cycle for greater control. Thanks to a memory function you can save and recall custom controls. For safety, the microwave is equipped with a keypad lockout to prevent unauthorized use. The Bella Microwave carries a 1 year manufacturer's warranty.
feature_bullets: Family-sized countertop microwave with 1000 watts of power and 10 power levels
Digital control with LED clock and kitchen timer
1-6 minute Express Cook controls; +30 second control; 6 Quick Start one-touch cooking functions
Defrost by time or weight; Multi-stage cooking; Memory-function saves custom controls
12.4-inch removable Glass Turntable ensures even cooking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
